name: Aditya

projects.title: Sales-Dashboard
projects.description: A web application of Sales dashboard where user can add, delete, edit shops, products, sales and can sort them as required, also they can visualize the analytics

projects.title: Chat-App
projects.description: A Web Chat-App where user can register , login and chat with other users

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A web application of task manager where user can login, register, add, delete tasks and can sort them as required

projects.title: Inventory Manager
projects.description: A web inventory manager where user can create inventories and create items inside them, set fynamic fields, RBAC admin access implemented

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.description: A easy game of Rock Paper Scissors where user can play with computer. The web app built using next js, authentication added using firebase, styling added using tailwind and daisyUI

projects.title: Content-Guardian
projects.description: ContentGuardian is a robust content management system with role-based access control (RBAC) for managing blog posts and comments. It provides different levels of access and permissions based on user roles.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: An weather web app which shows real time weather data

projects.title: Fake Book Generator
projects.description: A fake book generator web app using faker.js where seeds number generate fake book info

projects.title: User Management System
projects.description: A basic user management project where any user can block , delete any user.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: I build responsive and user-friendly web applications using React, NextJs Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI. I focus on creating seamless UI/UX experiences.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: I develop secure and scalable server-side applications using Node.js and Express.js. I also implement authentication, REST APIs.

services.title: Database Management
services.description: I design and manage databases using MongoDB, Firebase firestore.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: I create end-to-end web applications by integrating frontend, backend, and databases. My goal is to deliver high-performance, scalable web solutions.

aboutpara: Hey there! I am Aditya Singha. I'm a MERN stack developer passionate about building full-stack web applications. I love turning ideas into reality using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Let's connect and build something awesome together! ðŸš€
